> Well, I had a similar problem where especially if I were running file
sharing
> programs, my connection would drop, I had to power-cycle the modem.  What
we
> found was a setting in the high-speed modem where keep alive was set to 10
> minutes, so we changed it to 999, now I have no issues like this--and I've
run
